meta.title: All Tools - Complete List of 21 AI Development Tools | MCP Probe Kit
meta.description: MCP Probe Kit complete tool list: 6 workflow orchestration tools, 3 code analysis tools, 1 Git tool, 1 generation tool, 7 project management tools, 3 UI/UX tools.
meta.keywords: AI development tools, code generation tools, code review tools, Git automation, UI generation, code refactoring, performance optimization, security scanning

page.subtitle: MCP Probe Kit provides 21 practical tools with structured output support for core and orchestration tools

start_feature.description: Complete feature development workflow orchestration: check context ‚Üí generate specs ‚Üí estimate workload
start_feature.usage: Used to initiate complete feature development process, automatically generating requirement documents, design plans, and workload estimates

start_bugfix.description: Bug fix workflow orchestration: check context ‚Üí analyze and locate ‚Üí fix solution ‚Üí generate tests
start_bugfix.usage: Used for systematic bug fixing, providing complete analysis, location, fix, and test solutions

start_onboard.description: Project onboarding workflow: generate context documentation to help new members quickly understand the project
start_onboard.usage: Help new members quickly understand project structure, tech stack, and development standards

start_ralph.description: Ralph Wiggum Loop automated development, start loop development process with multiple safety protections enabled by default
start_ralph.usage: Start automated loop development, AI will continuously iterate until goal is achieved or safety limits are reached

start_product.description: Complete product design workflow orchestration: PRD ‚Üí prototype docs ‚Üí design system ‚Üí HTML prototype ‚Üí project context update
start_product.usage: One-click completion from requirements to HTML prototype, generating directly demonstrable product prototypes

start_ui.description: Unified UI development entry: check design system ‚Üí generate component catalog ‚Üí search/generate templates ‚Üí render code
start_ui.usage: One-click completion of entire UI development process, from design system to final code

code_review.description: Intelligent code review, analyzing code from multiple dimensions including security, performance, quality, style, and best practices
code_review.usage: Comprehensive code quality review, outputting structured issue list (severity/category/suggestion)

fix_bug.description: Bug fix guidance, providing root cause analysis, fix plan, test plan, and prevention measures
fix_bug.usage: Provide complete bug fix guidance, including root cause analysis, fix solution, test plan, and prevention measures

refactor.description: Refactoring suggestion tool, analyzing code structure, providing refactoring steps, risk assessment, and rollback plan
refactor.usage: Analyze code structure, provide refactoring suggestions, refactoring steps, and risk assessment

gencommit.description: Automatically generate Git commit messages compliant with Conventional Commits specification based on code changes
gencommit.usage: Generate commit messages compliant with Conventional Commits specification based on code changes

git_work_report.description: Generate work reports (daily/periodic) based on Git diff analysis, intelligently extracting actual work content
git_work_report.usage: Automatically read Git commits for specified dates, analyze diff content, generate concise professional work reports. If direct command fails, provides temporary script solution (auto-deleted after execution)

gentest.description: Generate unit tests, supporting Jest/Vitest/Mocha frameworks, including edge cases and mock data
gentest.usage: Generate unit test code, including edge cases and mocks

init_project.description: Generate requirement/design/task documents following Spec-Driven Development approach
init_project.usage: Generate requirement/design/task documents following Spec-Driven Development approach

init_project_context.description: Generate project context documentation (tech stack/architecture/coding standards)
init_project_context.usage: Generate project context documentation to help team quickly get started

add_feature.description: Generate new feature specification documents (requirements/design/task list) based on project context
add_feature.usage: Generate new feature specification documents (requirements/design/task list) based on project context

estimate.description: Estimate development workload, output story points, time range (optimistic/normal/pessimistic), risk points
estimate.usage: Estimate development workload, output story points, time range (optimistic/normal/pessimistic), risk points

interview.description: Requirements interview tool, clarifying requirements through structured questioning to avoid misunderstandings and rework
interview.usage: Requirements interview tool, clarifying requirements through structured questioning before development

ask_user.description: AI proactive questioning tool, supporting single or multiple questions, providing options, marking importance
ask_user.usage: AI proactively asks users questions, supporting single or multiple questions, providing options, marking importance

ui_design_system.description: Intelligent design system generator, generating complete design specifications based on product type reasoning
ui_design_system.usage: Based on product type and requirements, use AI reasoning engine to generate complete design system recommendations

ui_search.description: Search UI/UX database, including colors, icons, charts, components, design patterns, etc.
ui_search.usage: Search UI/UX database using BM25 algorithm for intelligent search

sync_ui_data.description: Sync UI/UX data to local cache, supporting automatic update checking and forced sync
sync_ui_data.usage: Sync UI/UX data to local cache, downloading latest data from npm package uipro-cli
